attributes.action: To reconsider the changes to the highway code .
attributes.additional_details: To reconsider these ill thought out changes and to consult fully with motorists and motoring organisations.
attributes.background: Motorists have not been properly consulted about these changes and the new code is biased towards both cyclists and pedestrians. This is causing uncertainty and danger , with the real risk for  potential conflict and stress to all road users.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607153
